load.name: load
load.valueBuilt: async e=>{let a={},i=await db.t_logbook_status.findMany({where:{status:"pending",id_user:user.id},select:{id_logbook:!0},orderBy:{date_time:"desc"}});return(await db.t_logbook.findMany({where:e.id_action?{id:{in:i.map(t=>t.id_logbook)},id_action:{equals:Number(e.id_action)}}:{id:{in:i.map(t=>t.id_logbook)}},select:{id:!0,id_action:!0,m_action:{select:{name:!0}},m_user:{select:{display_name:!0}},date:!0},orderBy:{date:"desc"}})).map(t=>({id:t.id,id_action:t.id_action,title:t.m_action.name,message:t.m_user.display_name,date:moment(t.date).format("DD MMM YYYY HH:mm")}))};

items.name: prop
